Title: Did Malaysia’s national airline promote pork?
Paragraphs:
Source: Facebook
No. This was fake news circulated mischievously. The misleading image was merely an image of beef. The fake news translated, states the following:
“Over 30 years, I’ve flown all over the world with MALAYSIA AIRLINE… not once did they openly promote pork in the MAS inflight magazine.. they dare to do so now. what happened to the Malay leaders in MAS.. are they not sensitive to such matters or did invisible hands force them to do so..”
Two independent news articles which we relied on, debunk this fake news. Read them here and here.
Author: Faizal Kamal
